name: Start Your Fashion Business
description: Do you dream of having your own brand? Turn your passion into reality with our 'Start Your Fashion Business' workshop! Join us for two powerful sessions packed with essential insights, expert guidance, and actionable steps to launch and grow your fashion business. Whether you're a designer, entrepreneur, or fashion enthusiast, this workshop is your gateway to success in the dynamic world of fashion. Don't just dream it—start it with us!

name: St. Lucie Park Mental Health Week Tree Planting Event
description:
Join us for a Mental Health Week themed planting event at St. Lucie Park. It will be a wonderful morning of planting native trees and shrubs in Toronto’s beautiful natural spaces.

Event site conditions vary. Contact us for more information including accessibility. If you would like to request accessibility support, contact us as soon as possible.

name: The Peak of Migration – High Park Walks with Mark Peck

location.name: High Park Nature Centre Forest School

description:
Note: Pre-registration is required for all our events, hikes and workshops. We do this to ensure we don’t exceed our capacity for indoor events or the maximum limits for group sizes on High Park’s ecologically sensitive trails. 

Rise and shine with the birds! Join Mark Peck for casual, relaxing early morning bird walks. You’re welcome to join as many walks as you’d like!

Binoculars will be available to borrow. All skill levels welcome!
